name: Snowy (WasaDev)
description:
Snowy

Snowy is a game originally born from a challenge, create a fun and pleasant game in 28 days in the theme of winter and Christmas vacations.The game is originally designed for multiplayer but due to many unforeseen circumstances we had to cancel it, today we are proud to present snowy as a single player game where you will have to survive as long as possible to a horrible and dangerous monster "The SnowMan", if you have the misfortune to meet him he will pursue you relentlessly (be careful with falling snowballs).

Attention the game is still in development, we hope to create a sequel next Christmas but in the meantime you will surely have fun with this one !

Credits:

Beautiful music by Lucien Renault

Dev: WasaDev

Support: Blaksky, Baixa, Nexus
